markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Fish](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=493)</title>

**Source** [Howl of the Wild](/Sources.aspx?ID=226) pg. 148 <sup>2.1</sup>

These magnificent creatures hide beneath the surface of the calm lakes, flowing rivers, and vast seas. The water is their domain, and some are quite protective of their home.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Fantooth School](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3276) (Creature 3), [Giant Fangtooth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3278) (Creature 4), [Stonefish](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3274) (Creature 0), [Stonefish Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3275) (Creature 2), [Swordfish](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3277) (Creature 3)
name: Fish
